website_summaries.verdict: A good pick if you want a good-looking casual shoe or are a skateboarder; otherwise consider others we tested if you need a shoe for more rigorous activities.
pros: Durable – combines suede, leather, and nubuck in a handsome low-profile style
Has sock-liner padding and low-cut design for a flexible and comfortable fit
cons: They have the tendency to make your feet hot, and they run on the small side
They also aren't ideal for running or exercising

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my son and we ended up getting the wrong color, after conversations with seller, they did issue a shipping label to return them but after some discussions my son decided just to keep these ones and he loves them and is wearing them all the time. The reason he wanted a different color was because he didn't want the white trip, the other ones he wanted had like a brownish tint to it so they would not look as dirty. But actually these white trims come very clean almost like new with just some rubbing alcohol. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and strong
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Have used them from around a year. With most other casual shoes, my shoe soul used to wear off in a few months of regular wear but not these. These are going decent after a year of use. 1. Comfortable 2. Good quality - Soul does not give away/ wear off even with a lot of walking 3. Do not get damaged in water
customer_reviews.author: GauravJ

customer_reviews.title: Extremely narrow. Had to send back.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was incredibly narrow. I couldn’t put my foot in it any way I tried. I asked someone with smaller feet and they said it was uncomfortable too. They looked super cute and was bummed they didn’t fit. If you’re not in a rush give them a try but be prepared for them to possibly be too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: TeenerJoy

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow shoe, wider footed people guys be aware
customer_reviews.text: Really narrow shoe. I know I have wider as a size 13 but if I buy a size 13 and every other shoe brand I've worn fit then there shouldn't be a discrepancy in this particular one. Great shoe overall but the size was way too small and hurt my feet until weeks later when the shoe broke in, and even then it was still tight so I barely wore these for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Kleschick

customer_reviews.title: he loves them so much and the added benefit is that you can't really tell when they get dirty so they also look nice
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend for Valentines day. First off, they arrived in a day and a half and I didn't even have to sign up for Amazon Prime! Anyways, he loves them so much and the added benefit is that you can't really tell when they get dirty so they also look nice. He walks a lot everyday, usually about 5 miles or more for his job and has said that these shoes have made a HUGE difference. He can wear them to work with slacks, with jeans to see friends and to work out if need be. He's been wearing them for a month(almost) straight and absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My left shoes fits wonderfully. Even after adjusting the laces and wearing for ...
customer_reviews.text: The look and feel to there shoes hold quite true to the picture. I had these for over a month and there's no major problems. They are made well and give the right support needed/expected. I'm currently wearing them at work for casual Friday at a big bank so they are versatile for sure. My left shoes fits wonderfully. Even after adjusting the laces and wearing for a while, my right shoe is still a little tight around the big toe joint. I believe it's just due to stitching in how it was made but it rarely causes any discomfort. Great shoe and great purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe and classy enough I can wear with biz casual clothing.
customer_reviews.text: Love wearing these two work. They are casual yet subtle enough with the logo that I can wear them to work. I'm 9.5 US Mens and they fit perfectly. They clean up well and comfortable. I wear them 8 to 9 hours a day at work and my feet stay dry and comfortable. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I don't like buying shoes online because of not being sure how ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't like buying shoes online because of not being sure how they will fit. I actually tried a similar pair (grey) ones on in a store, but of course the store didn't have the color that I wanted... I really haven't worn these, except to try the on when they arrived, but I think that I'll like them.
customer_reviews.author: RustyS

customer_reviews.title: Great for biz casual
customer_reviews.text: Received many compliments on these shoes. Great for business casual and comfortable for all day wear. I also own the gray pair too. Hard to find colors in my size. 9.5 US mens. These fit as stated on the site. I'm 9.5 and these are true to sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I’ve had them for about a year now and they are still in great condition. A little bit of fading but I wear them daily and in all weather
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Little bigger
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe. Had some glue residue on the bottom side of the shoe. Ut was able to puck it off. Not a bad shoe just was a little bigger than what i had expected
customer_reviews.author: Keith Yeregui

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. He skates in them. They are durable and they last! Great buy, great price on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene

customer_reviews.title: Everybody's happy.
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes these shoes. I really like that I didn't have to take him shoe shopping! His last pair of Nikes were a size smaller and are very tight on him now. We went up a size, perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed it didn't ship with a box for storing. Instead, it just came shipped in a bag and it made me nervous they aren't real. None the less, I really like the shoes. The fit nice and look great on my husband.
customer_reviews.author: LNG

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed. They look amazing with jeans and joggers. Exactly what I was hoping for and the price was right too. Love, love, love.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes but they are very narrow
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes but they are very narrow. I'm a woman and bought a man's size and even still it's narrow. I have average feet and do not buy wide width shoes.
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: NARROW
customer_reviews.text: My husband has other Nike’s and Nike SB’s that fit fine. These were too narrow in the middle of his foot. Heel to toe fit fine. But had to return.
customer_reviews.author: GraceL

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoes, been skating (long board and skateboard) 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid shoes, been skating (long board and skateboard) 5 days a week for 2 months and they look almost new.

customer_reviews.title: because they look great with jeans and I even get away with wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Won't skate in these til they are well worn out, because they look great with jeans and I even get away with wearing them to work.

customer_reviews.title: My Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them! I got these to replace his torn up pair from years ago.

customer_reviews.text: These shoes are lightweight and really comfortable. They are a little narrow but fit my feet the same as other Nike shoes.

customer_reviews.text: My 17 year old son is very hard on shoes...these have held up wonderfully well. Look very nice as well.

customer_reviews.title: If you’re a skater, these are the go to.

customer_reviews.title: Nike, what happened?
customer_reviews.text: Nike has made great products, but supporting Kaepernick is the dumbest thing ever. I’m done with them.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Perfect casual show for my teenage son. Wish they would repel foot odor.....

customer_reviews.text: Just needed to be a little bit wider width and would have been really good

customer_reviews.title: Run really big..! Be aware.
customer_reviews.text: Run a whole size bigger. Purchased a 9 1/2 and it was like a 10 1/2

customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband & he loves it. He says they fit great and comfortable

customer_reviews.text: Overall good shoe but beware of the size of the shoe, and the size of your foot as they run small

customer_reviews.title: great price for good quality shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great price for good quality shoes. Shipping was fast. Package arrived in perfect condition. My son likes these shoes. Very happy customer.

customer_reviews.text: My son just loves them so he ordered another pair but a different sole color.

customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, they're so comfortable and exactly what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: I've only worn them a few times and they feel natural and comfortable on my feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to switch up my vans game. They fit very similar although more narrow along the sides. I've only worn them a few times and they feel natural and comfortable on my feet.

customer_reviews.text: Very narrow fit!! Needed to overly loosen the laces to make it more comfortable.

customer_reviews.text: The size comes in a bit small and I recommend buyers to get a half a size to a size larger. Otherwise the shoe looks great.

customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a 13-14 I bought a 14 to be on the safe side and this shoe was way to small, I can barley get my foot into the shoe let alone wear it.

customer_reviews.title: VERY narrow fit for Mens shoes
customer_reviews.text: Returned these shoes, VERY narrow fit, These shoes shouldn't be in Mens. Beware that you will end up paying for restocking fees and return shipping, even if have prime membership. Not worth risking it if you are not 100% sure about the fit. Do not recommend this shoe if you are looking for Mens shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Too small

customer_reviews.title: Package shipped quickly and shoes looked great. They fit length-wise but were way too narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shoes as I've been wearing similar styled Nike shoes for a while now. Package shipped quickly and shoes looked great. They fit length-wise but were way too narrow to wear comfortably. Ended up returning for a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are smaller then what I asked for and ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are smaller then what I asked for and the inside sole on my right shoe is already riping some how and on the outside of bother shoes the trim is starting to separate

customer_reviews.title: If you want to get some...

They are comfortable, and look good... pretty sure I'm gonna get lucky tonight, my wife has complimented them a few times today... so, the moral of the story is, buy these if you want to get some...

customer_reviews.title: When I put my foot in they are super tight and feel like they don't fit ( but ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes somewhat tight. When I put my foot in they are super tight and feel like they don't fit ( but they do fit), I use them for work so i'm trying to feel comfortable in them but it feels impossible, tried the shoe on bear foot too and around the beginning of the tongue of the shoe it feels super tight and somewhat painful. still don't know if I've given the shoes a fair try since i've only wore them once.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not wide enough for my feet. I returned it and bought a pair Adidas instead.

customer_reviews.title: Oompa Loompa Shoe Sizing
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are way too small. I have wore a size-10 shoe since high school. Doesn't matter brand or type, always a size 10. These fit more like a size 8 1/2. I couldn't believe how small they were. Totally disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are super tight
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was a very nice shoe. But the problem was that the shoe was super tight. I could barely walk in them and they were very uncomfortable. I tried wearing them around the house but I couldn't because how uncomfortable they were.

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Sb Clutch Skate Shoe
product_meta.description: Men's NIKE SB Clutch Skateboarding Shoe combines a durable, minimal design with a low-profile outsole that's fused to the upper, delivering great flexibility and comfort.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Suede, leather and Nubuck materials offer premium durability
Low-cut silhouette provides a nonrestrictive fit
Tacky gum rubber outsole provides great traction
Traditional autoclave construction for a low-to-the-ground ride
